game.name: Night of the Living Bubble
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: NOT YOUR AVERAGE NIGHT SHIFT... When clocking into work, you find that your business has been overrun by monsters borne from the products on the shelves. Constructed by a mad scientist bent on world domination, only YOU can stop them and save the world by shooting monsters with your Nailgun.
